text: Manish Arora (Hindi:मनीष अरोरा) (Punjabi: ਮਨੀਸ਼ ਅਰੋੜਾ) is an Indian fashion designer. Arora was born in Mumbai. He now lives in New Delhi. ==Career== In 1997 Arora started a fashion label called Manish Arora. In 2001 Arora started his second fashion label Fish Fry. ==Personal life== Manish Arora is a Sikh. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Fashion designers Category:People from New Delhi
title: Manish Arora
